turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Raf Simons.
turn.1: What did Raf Simons do with Eastpak?
turn.2: Simons has designed three collaborations with American bag manufacture Eastpak: Spring-Summer 2008, Fall-Winter 2008 and Spring-Summer 2009.
turn.3: Did he do anything else with Eastpak?
turn.4: The collaboration has continued for the Fall-Winter 2013 season.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: In 2009, Simons used denim bleached by artist Sterling Ruby to create a capsule collection of denim wear jeans and jackets.
turn.7: Did he work a lot with Sterling Ruby?
turn.8: In 2014, Simons once again collaborated with Ruby, jointly designing a Fall-Winter 2014 collection, which was presented in place of Simon's eponymous line and carried the label 'Raf Simons/Sterling Ruby'.
turn.9: What other collaborations did he do?
turn.10: In 2014 Raf Simons began a collaboration with the Danish design and textile company Kvadrat that would translate into a collection of textiles and accessories.
turn.11: Did he have any other awards or recognition?
turn.12: The Kvadrat/Raf Simons collection received great recognition in the media and is distinguished by the blending of colour and materials for which the designer is known in the fashion world.
